Lord Elder sat there a moment, the massive expanse of the Ark was almost to=
o much to handle in any aspect. He and his crew were not equipt to deal wit=
h such. Observe from a distance, yes. Be in the midst of it all... no. 

Hi=
s fingertips rubbing his faceplate as he pondering all that had happened. F=
rom what it appeared, Atlantis was a wreck. And the Ark, barely escaped the=
 massive tsunami. What caused the tsunami was something worth investigating=
. 

The point was.... now what? When will the Predacons - or someone else -=
 make another attempt on the Ark? 
He had to find a way for the Ark to rema=
in safe and unknown to all. Difficult since many here already knew where it=
 was. 

"Ugghhh," he groaned. "This is quickly spiraling out of control." M=
umbling to himself.
